name: Avocado Chickpea Salad with Chili Lime Dressing
description: Say hello to this vibrant Avocado Chickpea Salad, a refreshing and nutritious twist on a classic dish. Packed with creamy avocado and protein-rich chickpeas, it's the perfect meal to keep you feeling full and satisfied!
instructions: For the dressing, combine dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Whisk together until mixed thoroughly.
In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, avocado, carrots, and dressing. Toss together until evenly combined.
